title: Densou Dorothy
description: A popular idol, Haruki, is the star of a commercial for an immersive virtual reality game called “Yellow Brick Road”. To help with the promotion of the game, his manager persuades him to enter the game as a “guardian” and defeat a band of thieves. However, Haruki encounters an adventure he never could have imagined!

matches.title: Kono Mama ja Dame Mitai desu
Mint de Kiss me - Watase Yuu Masterpiece Collection 5
